footer.v: Số liệu đã lưu đến ngày %d. Nhấn vào nút Nhận để tiếp tục lưu số liệu.
footer.e: The last backup has been done on %d. Click on the Ok button to continue backup.

command.text: if not exists(select 1 from @@sysDatabaseName..userinfo where id = @@userID and admin = 1) select '' as field, case when @@language = 'V' then N'Không có quyền truy cập chức năng này' else 'You have not permission in this function' end as message else begin if 1 = 0 --not exists(select 1 from fn_my_permissions (null, 'database') where upper(permission_name) = 'BACKUP DATABASE') select '' as field, case when @@language = 'V' then N'Không có quyền truy cập chức năng này' else 'You have not permission in this function' end as message else begin select 'this._bkDate = "' + convert(varchar(10), ngay_lt, 103) + '"; active$FormFilter$(this);' as message from dmstt end end return

if exists(select 1 from options where upper(name) = 'M_USE_SYSTEM_FUNCTION' and val = 1) begin declare @sysBakName nvarchar(64), @appBakName nvarchar(64), @subFix char(16), @backupDir nvarchar(512), @compress bit, @sql nvarchar(4000), @d smalldatetime select @d = getdate(), @subFix = convert(char(8), getdate(), 112) + replace(convert(varchar(8), @d, 108),':',''), @compress = 0 select @sysBakName = 'bk@@sysDatabaseName_' + @subFix + '.bak', @appBakName = 'bk@@appDatabaseName_' + @subFix + '.bak' select @backupDir = val from options where name = 'm_autobk_dir'
if substring(@backupDir, len(@backupDir) - 1, 1) <> '/' or substring(@backupDir, len(@backupDir) - 1, 1) <> '\' select @backupDir = @backupDir + '\' if exists(select 1 from options where name = 'm_autobk_zip' and val = 1) begin declare @ver varchar(64), @nVer int select @ver = cast(serverproperty('productversion') as varchar(64)) select @nVer = cast(substring(@ver, 0, charindex('.', @ver)) as int) if @nVer >= 10 set @compress = 1 end
If @compress = 1 begin select @sql = 'backup database [@@sysDatabaseName] to disk = ''' + @backupDir + @sysBakName + ''' with init, compression' select @sql = @sql + char(10) + char(13) + 'backup database [@@appDatabaseName] to disk = ''' + @backupDir + @appBakName + ''' with init, compression' end else begin select @sql = 'backup database [@@sysDatabaseName] to disk = ''' + @backupDir + @sysBakName + '''' select @sql = @sql + char(10) + char(13) + 'backup database [@@appDatabaseName] to disk = ''' + @backupDir + @appBakName + '''' end exec sp_executesql @sql
update dmstt set ngay_lt = @d end
